name: zm-event-kit
description: An event kit for Node and Browsers

scripts.compile: uc-compile src/CompositeDisposable.js --Babel > dist/CompositeDisposable.js; uc-compile src/Disposable.js --Babel > dist/Disposable.js; uc-compile src/Emitter.js --Babel > dist/Emitter.js; uc-compile src/EventKit.js --Babel > dist/EventKit.js; uc-compile src/Browser.js --Babel > dist/Browser.js

author: steelbrain
